create_db: CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS EI_PLACE_DATA
create_tax: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TAX (tax_code integer NOT NULL, tax_name varchar(255) NOT NULL, tax_rate decimal(10,2) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY(tax_code))
create_stock_category: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS STOCK_CATEGORY (stock_id integer NOT NULL, stock_name varchar(255), PRIMARY KEY (stock_id))
create_supplier: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS SUPPLIER (supplier_id integer NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, supplier_name varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(supplier_id))
create_stock: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS STOCK (stock_code varchar(255) NOT NULL, product_name varchar(255) NOT NULL, SELLING_PRICE decimal(10,2) NOT NULL, purchase_price decimal (10,2), stock_level integer NOT NULL, date_added datetime NOT NULL, stock_category integer NOT NULL, reorder_level integer, unit_cost decimal(10,2), items_unit integer, supplier_id integer, tax_code integer NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (stock_code))
